entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 25. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow overnight. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 18. POP 60%
